description: Simplify server monitoring with our Full Server Status dashboard. Track important metrics such as CPU and memory utilization, disk space usage, network traffic, and more in a single view.

targets.expr: ((sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job",instance="$instance", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100) or ((sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$instance",job="$job",mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100)

panels.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.
panels.title: CPU iowait time

panels.description: The amount of disk devices in the system
panels.title: Disk drives

panels.description: Number of users who are currently logged in
panels.title: Logged in Users

panels.description: This item is the percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive was busy servicing read or writes requests.
panels.title: $diskdevices (I/O usage)

defaults.noValue: "This feature is only available on 'windows_exporter' for now."

title: Full Server Status
